snippet.title: KAPIA Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
A point & clickl adventure of a small girl and her grandfather in a funky apocalyptic world of KAPIA. Solve puzzles, play mini-games, interact with eccentric characters to unveil the mystery of the KAPIA dome dwellers.
Kickstarter 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2for2/kapia

Steam 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1351140/KAPIA/

Website
https://www.kapiagame.com/

Facebook 
https://www.facebook.com/KAPIAgame

Twitter 
https://www.twitter.com/AnnaMimik
